messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] RE: offlist emails, WAS dogs & prolife
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/5/01 4:47:37 PM Pacific Standard Time, bonniepainter@hotmail.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/5/01 4:47:37 PM Pacific Standard Time,
bonniepainter@... writes:

<< I think you were right to share that with the list Sandra. Things get
really nasty when personal attacks occur. If it started on the list, it
should be kept on the list unless otherwise invited to take it off list.
Taking it off list without the other's permission is harassment and invasion
of privacy, imho.
>>

I have to agree and support Sandra in this. Our opinions on a lot of things
are similar. On others they are far apart. In any case, I think it is
inappropriate to email anyone off-list without permission. If you stand
behind what you say, then say it to the whole list. If you think it is
off-topic, which is almost nothing here, then *ask* if that person wishes to
participate in an offlist discussion. Anonymity does not excuse disrespect.
